title: Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Act, 2020
title_en: Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Act, 2020
description: Official consolidated text of Superior Courts (Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Act, 2020 (VIII of 2020) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Superior Courts
(Court Dress and Mode of Address) Order (Repeal) Act, 2020.
(2)    It shall come into force at once.

provisions.title: Section 2. Repeal of Presidentâ€™s Order No. 15 of 1980
provisions.content:
The Superior Courts (Court Dress
and Mode of Address) Order, 1980 (P.O. No. 15 of 1980), is hereby repealed.
